text: (light music)
- I'm Shivani Gaikwad.
I'm currently working as a working student
here at AWS Manufacturing sales team.

I'm doing this as a part-time
job along with my studies.
As a working student,

I'm supporting account
managers in sales team,
not just with their daily task,
but also with strategic projects,

some customer reach out
initiatives and things like that.
As a early career talent,
it's also more about exploring my journey,

my path within AWS and the
best part of working at AWS
is you have all this opportunity

that you can take on and
everyone is helping you

and guiding you which career
part to take on moving forward.
I think the most exciting part
is definitely meeting
so many amazing people,
so much of talent here at AWS.
There are so many inspiring women.
I want to learn from them
and also exchange more great ideas.
It's very flexible for me working at AWS.
My manager lets me have complete freedom,
how I arrange my schedule

because I'm also studying
along with my work schedule,
so I could actually plan my schedule
also with my studies really well.
What really interested me joining AWS

was the leadership principles
and the company culture.
This was really inspiring for me
to see it
also in action here.
(light music)
